description:
Did you know that you could easily learn 80% of the most frequently used words and phrases in Mandarin Chinese?

Did you know that you could master Mandarin Chinese pronunciation in just a few hours?

Did you know that you could be able to communicate effectively and accurately in China?

In this course, you will learn the skills to start your Chinese language learning.

This course isn’t magic and you’re not going to become a native-sounding speaker overnight, but you don’t need to be fluent to enjoy the beautiful Chinese countryside or communicate in professional settings.

This course targets essential vocabulary for everyday situations, so that you become comfortable with the core vocabulary used by native Chinese speakers.

You will learn essential conversational Chinese for situations such as:

·        Everyday greetings

·        Asking for and following directions

·        Ordering food at restaurants

·        Traveling by public transportation or by taxi

·        Making purchases

·        Booking a hotel room

·        and much more

So why did we call it “Your China Adventure—Survival Chinese?”?

Because not only is traveling through China an adventure, so is the process of learning the language!

And why “Survival Chinese”? Because by the end of this course, you’ll be able to make it through an entire trip without an interpreter.  And of course, should you find yourself lost in the middle of the countryside, you’ll have the skills to make it back to your hotel, no dictionary necessary.
title: Your China Adventure --- Survival Chinese and Culture Tips
